lines.text: You mean that one-eyed monster we buried back at the camp is the heir to ten thousand years of human progress?
Armageddon. The slaughter of humanity. An atomic war no one wanted, but which no one had the wisdom to avoid.
Our women seem to have lagged behind in their evolution into reasonable creatures. They actually admire these reckless and brutal men.
Is she as beautiful as the women in your world?

[admiring Herbert Ellis's pecs]
My, you are so much more muscular than our men.
The surface of the Earth was meant for man. He wasn't meant to live in a hole in the ground.
